argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ontgsucval | |- ( A e. On -> ( topGen ` suc A ) = suc A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( A e. On -> suc A e. On ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ontopbas | |- ( suc A e. On -> suc A e. TopBases ) |
| 4 |  | #P_tgcl | |- ( suc A e. TopBases -> ( topGen ` suc A ) e. Top ) |
| 5 | 2, 3, 4 | #P_3syl | |- ( A e. On -> ( topGen ` suc A ) e. Top ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( A e. On -> suc A e. Top ) |
